channel.title: I need help with
channel.description: Everytime I try to log in the window tells me that the server must be down even though I know its up... I need to know how to add a port onto the computer but theres no firewall. Anyone who understands please give me some suggestions thanks.

item.title: I need help with
item.dc:creator: @Stupid_Me420 Stupid_Me420
item.description:
@Stupid_Me420 wrote:

My computer doesnt have a firewall on the control panel… But it does have norton but I turned it off for the time being.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.description:
@liamsford wrote:

[quote=“O M G, post:4, topic:64513”]Turn off your fire walls ?
[center][/quote]DO NOT turn them off!

Go to your Control Pannel.

Then Network and Internet Connections

Then Firewall

Then Exceptions Tab

Then press the “Add Port…” button.

Open up a port 43594 and another 5555

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G

item.title: I need help with
item.dc:creator: @Stupid_Me420 Stupid_Me420
item.description:
@Stupid_Me420 wrote:

I know that the Server is online though… Even if it wasnt I have tried over 20 different no-ip servers… And I dont have hamachi so I use no-ip servers.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.description:
@liamsford wrote:

You don’t need to open a port. That just means the owner has put the server offline. Try a few diffrent servers and make sure you enter the correct PORT and IP-Adress.

Read full topic
